meanings.definition: Not diluted or made weaker by the addition of water or other substances.
meanings.sent1: The undiluted orange juice tasted very strong and pure.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the undiluted flavor of the coffee without any milk.
meanings.sent3: The undiluted lemonade was so intense, it made everyone pucker.
meanings.sent4: His undiluted passion for music was evident in every note he played.
meanings.sent5: The undiluted power of the storm left a lasting impression on the town.

meanings.definition: Pure and concentrated, without any added ingredients or substances.
meanings.sent1: The undiluted perfume had a strong and pure scent.
meanings.sent2: The undiluted honey was rich and flavorful.
meanings.sent3: Her undiluted excitement for the party was contagious.
meanings.sent4: The undiluted joy on their faces was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The undiluted beauty of the sunset took her breath away.
